headline.main: Terry Myerson Rises to Powerful New Role in Charge of Microsoft Devices

docs.snippet: Mr. Myerson, who already led one of the largest software organizations in the world in Microsoft’s operating systems group, takes on a division that has been troubled in recent years....
docs.abstract: Mr. Myerson, who already led one of the largest software organizations in the world in Microsoft’s operating systems group, takes on a division that has been troubled in recent years.

headline.main: Lasers, Magnetism Allow Glimpses of the Human Brain at Work
headline.print_headline: Lasers, Magnetism Allow Glimpses of the Human Brain at Work

docs.snippet: To the untrained eye, the graph looked like a very volatile day on Wall Street — jagged peaks and valleys in red, blue and green, displayed on a wall. But the story it told was not about economics....
docs.lead_paragraph: To the untrained eye, the graph looked like a very volatile day on Wall Street — jagged peaks and valleys in red, blue and green, displayed on a wall. But the story it told was not about economics.

docs.snippet: A gambler discovers a talented young golfer in a small rural town and convinces him to start playing in high-stakes matches, but the stakes grow until the game becomes "life or death."...
docs.lead_paragraph: A gambler discovers a talented young golfer in a small rural town and convinces him to start playing in high-stakes matches, but the stakes grow until the game becomes "life or death."

docs.snippet: A 12-year-old boy and his newfound friend, a rambunctious talking dog, embark on a quest to uncover a long-lost goldmine, unaware they are being trailed by a pair of bumbling thieves bent on taking them hostage....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 12-year-old boy and his newfound friend, a rambunctious talking dog, embark on a quest to uncover a long-lost goldmine, unaware they are being trailed by a pair of bumbling thieves bent on taking them hostage.

headline.main: France Says Iran Deal 'Still Not Clear' as Deadline Nears
headline.print_headline: France Says Iran Deal 'Still Not Clear' as Deadline Nears

docs.snippet: France's Foreign Minister Laurent Fabius said on Sunday it was unclear whether an international deal could be reached on Iran's nuclear programme by a June 30 deadline....
docs.lead_paragraph: France's Foreign Minister Laurent Fabius said on Sunday it was unclear whether an international deal could be reached on Iran's nuclear programme by a June 30 deadline.

headline.main: Few Clues in Detroit Party Shooting That Killed 1, Hurt 11
headline.print_headline: Few Clues in Detroit Party Shooting That Killed 1, Hurt 11

docs.snippet: A wall of silence surrounds a shootout at a block party in Detroit that left a 19-year-old gunman dead and 11 other people wounded, police Chief James Craig said Sunday from the site where about 300 people had barbecued and celebrated hours earlie...
docs.lead_paragraph: A wall of silence surrounds a shootout at a block party in Detroit that left a 19-year-old gunman dead and 11 other people wounded, police Chief James Craig said Sunday from the site where about 300 people had barbecued and celebrated hours earlier.

headline.main: Russian Opposition Activist Attacked on Campaign Trip
headline.print_headline: Russian Opposition Activist Attacked on Campaign Trip

docs.snippet: A Russian activist who works with opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been hospitalized after being attacked while on a campaign trip in Russia's far east....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Russian activist who works with opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been hospitalized after being attacked while on a campaign trip in Russia's far east.

headline.main: Man Arrested After Trans-Atlantic Flight Diverted
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested After Trans-Atlantic Flight Diverted

docs.snippet: Authorities have arrested a 42-year-old man for endangering the safety of a plane after a United Airlines flight from Rome to Chicago was forced to divert to Northern Ireland....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities have arrested a 42-year-old man for endangering the safety of a plane after a United Airlines flight from Rome to Chicago was forced to divert to Northern Ireland.
